howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Our scientific approach to condition monitoring combines ISO-standard techniques with advanced AI-powered diagnostics.

steps.title: Comprehensive Data Collection
steps.description: We deploy our advanced sensors across your critical equipment to capture vibration signatures with precision accuracy following ISO 10816 standards.

steps.title: Advanced Signal Processing
steps.description: Our proprietary algorithms process raw data using FFT analysis, time waveform diagnostics, and envelope detection for comprehensive fault identification.

steps.title: AI-Powered Diagnostics
steps.description: Machine learning algorithms trained on 15,000+ vibration signatures identify developing faults with 94% accuracy and provide actionable recommendations.
